TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the class.

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, a marcação que descreve um controle que é derivado de classe é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup that describes a control that is derived from the class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o código de controle de tempo de design é persistente para a origem da marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup source and edited into the markup for the Web page. Designers que derivam de classe base abstrata dão suporte em tempo de design para controles que são derivados do classe.Designers that are derived from the abstract base class provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância de um designer que é derivado de classe quando ele cria o controle associado na superfície de design.The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of a designer that is derived from the class when it creates the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ConnectToDataSource () As Boolean

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.

returns.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; if the old and new data sources are the same.

span.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; if the old and new data sources are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A implementação de método normalmente envolve a remover eventos da fonte de dados anterior e, em seguida, anexar novos eventos para a nova fonte de dados.The implementation of the method typically involves unhooking events from the previous data source, and then attaching new events to the new data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated object.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated object.

remarks.format: ## Examples Para obter um exemplo de um substituição que exibe uma caixa de diálogo que pode ser usada para criar uma fonte de dados para o controle associado, consulte .For an example of a override that displays a dialog that can be used to create a data source for the associated control, see .

span.para: Substituir o método para fornecer uma forma de criar um controle associado objeto em tempo de design.
Override the method to provide a means of creating a control for the associated object at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: The with which this designer is associated.

span.span: The with which this designer is associated.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the class.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando você substituir o método em um designer que é derivado do classe, execute as ações necessárias para configurar o controle associado a dados, de modo que quando a marcação de tempo de design é recuperada, o controle é processado corretamente.When you override the method in a designer that is derived from the class, perform the necessary actions to set up the data-bound control so that when the design-time markup is retrieved, the control renders properly. Normalmente, você associará uma fonte de dados de tempo de design em vez de fonte de dados ao vivo, por motivos de desempenho.Typically, you will associate a design-time data source rather than the live data source, for performance reasons.

summary.span: Gets or sets the value of the property for the associated control.

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property for the associated control.

value.span: A expressão de associação de dados usada pelo controle associado derivado de .

span.span: The data-binding expression used by the associated control derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks O propriedade é usada para sombra o propriedade o classe que está associado este designer.The property is used to shadow the property of the class that is associated with this designer. O valor da propriedade é mantida pelo designer como uma expressão de associação de dados na marca que é gerada para subjacente objeto.The value of the property is persisted by the designer as a data-binding expression on the tag that is generated for the underlying object.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método desvincula os manipuladores de eventos para o designer de todos os eventos de fonte de dados.The method unhooks the event handlers for the designer from all data source events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.

span.span: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.

returns.span: The markup used to render the control at design time.

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O classe recupera dados de exemplo que são usados para fins de associação em tempo de design antes de processar o controle.The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. Se o controle não está associado a dados, ele chama o método.If the control is not data bound, it calls the method. Se houver um erro ao processar o controle, ele chama o método.If there is an error rendering the control, it calls the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.

returns.span: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O classe recupera dados de exemplo que são usados para fins de associação em tempo de design antes de processar o controle.The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. O controle de tempo de design vazio é renderizada como um espaço reservado que contém o nome do tipo e o nome do controle.The empty design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name and control name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

span.span: The that was thrown.

summary.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O controle de tempo de design de erro é renderizada como um espaço reservado que contém o nome do tipo, o nome do controle e uma mensagem que descreve o erro.The error design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and a message describing the error.

summary.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O host de designer chama o método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar um controle que é derivado do classe.The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render a control that is derived from the class. O método e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e conectar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.

param.name: forceUpdateView
param.span: to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, .

span.span: to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, .

summary.span: Called when the data source of the associated object changes.

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método conecta-se à fonte de dados atual.The method connects to the current data source. Se a fonte de dados atual é diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado anteriormente, ou `forceUpdateView` é `true`, o controle associado é redesenhado na superfície de design.If the current data source is different from the data source to which the control was previously connected, or `forceUpdateView` is `true`, the associated control is redrawn on the design surface.

span.para: Substituir o método para executar ações adicionais que são necessárias quando altera a fonte de dados do controle associado. Se você substituir o método, chame a implementação base antes de executar outro processamento.

Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when the data source of the associated control changes. If you override the method, call the base implementation before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed
abstract member OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit override this.OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit

summary.span: Called when the data source of the associated object loads a new schema.

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object loads a new schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método trata o evento, que é gerado quando o esquema dos dados de origem para que o controle associado está associado é alterado.The method handles the event, which is raised when the schema of the data source to which the associated control is bound changes. Substituir o método para executar ações adicionais que são necessárias quando o novo esquema está disponível.Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when new schema is available.

param.name: properties
param.span: The containing the properties to filter.

span.span: The containing the properties to filter.

summary.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. Para o classe, o sombras a propriedade do controle.For the class, the shadows the property of the control. Ele faz uma cópia da matriz de atributo de e, em seguida, adiciona esses atributos para a propriedade sombreada.It makes a copy of the attribute array of the , and then adds these attributes to the shadowed property. Define o atributo do sombreado propriedade `false` , a menos que o atributo do propriedade do controle já está definida como `true`.It sets the attribute of the shadowed property to `false` unless the attribute of the property of the control is already set to `true`.

span.para: Substituir o método para adicionar ou alterar atributos de propriedades na coleção de propriedades de tempo de design. Certifique-se de chamar o método base antes de executar outro processamento.
Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
